glsa.title: mlterm: Integer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: mlterm is vulnerable to an integer overflow, which could potentially allow the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: mlterm is a multi-lingual terminal emulator.

description.p: mlterm is vulnerable to an integer overflow that can be triggered by specifying a large image file as a background. This only effects users that have compiled mlterm with the 'gtk' USE flag, which enables gdk-pixbuf support.

impact.p: An attacker can create a specially-crafted image file which, when used as a background by the victim, can lead to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running mlterm.

workaround.p: Re-compile mlterm without the 'gtk' USE flag.
